SEARCH
Package interfaces

Interface IApplicationService

public interface IApplicationService
IApplicationService interface defines operations for managing BTO applications in the system. Provides methods to create, retrieve, update, and manage applications and withdrawals.

  • Method Summary

    Method

  • Method Details

    • addApplication

      void addApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Adds an application to the system.
      Parameters:
      application - Application to be added.

    • removeApplication

      void removeApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Removes an application from the system.
      Parameters:
      application - Application to be removed.

    • getAllApplications

      Map<String,BTOApplication> getAllApplications()
      Retrieves all applications in the system.
      Returns:
      Map of all applications, keyed by applicant NRIC.

    • getApplicationByNRIC

      BTOApplication getApplicationByNRIC(String nric)
      Retrieves an application by applicant NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      Application associated with the given NRIC, or null if not found.

    • createApplication

      BTOApplication createApplication(int id, Applicant applicant, String projectName, FlatType flatType, ApplicationStatus status, boolean withdrawal)
      Creates a new application and adds it to the system.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the application (0 for auto-generated ID).
      applicant - Applicant submitting the application.
      projectName - Name of the project the application is for.
      flatType - Flat type being applied for.
      status - Status of the application (e.g., PENDING, APPROVED).
      withdrawal - Indicates if a withdrawal request is associated with the application.
      Returns:
      Newly created BTOApplication object.

    • isEligible

      boolean isEligible(Applicant applicant, FlatType flatType)
      Checks if an applicant is eligible to apply for a specific flat type.
      Parameters:
      applicant - Applicant to check eligibility for.
      flatType - Flat type being checked.
      Returns:
      True if the applicant is eligible, false otherwise.

    • applyProject

      BTOApplication applyProject(Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, FlatType flatType)
      Submits an application for a project on behalf of an applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - Applicant submitting the application.
      project - Project the application is for.
      flatType - Flat type being applied for.
      Returns:
      Newly created BTOApplication object.

    • requestWithdrawal

      void requestWithdrawal(Applicant applicant)
      Submits a withdrawal request for an applicant's application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - Applicant requesting the withdrawal.

    • approveApplication

      void approveApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Approves an application.
      Parameters:
      application - Application to be approved.

    • rejectApplication

      void rejectApplication(BTOApplication application)
      Rejects an application.
      Parameters:
      application - Application to be rejected.

    • approveWithdrawal

      void approveWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Approves a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      application - Application with the withdrawal request to be approved.

    • rejectWithdrawal

      void rejectWithdrawal(BTOApplication application)
      Rejects a withdrawal request for an application.
      Parameters:
      application - Application with the withdrawal request to be rejected.

    • hasAccessToApplication

      boolean hasAccessToApplication(Officer officer, BTOApplication application)
      Checks if an officer has access to a specific application.
      Parameters:
      officer - Officer attempting to access the application.
      application - Application being accessed.
      Returns:
      True if the officer has access, false otherwise.
